{  title: 1,  author: 1})Update Rowdb.posts.update({ title: 'Post Two' },{  title: 'Post Two',  body: 'New body for post 2',  date: Date()},{  upsert: true})Update Specific Fielddb.posts.update({ title: 'Post Two' },{  $set: {    body: 'Body for post 2',    category: 'Technology'  }})Increment Field ($inc)db.posts.update({ title: 'Post Two' },{  $inc: {    likes: 5  }})Rename Fielddb.posts.update({ title: 'Post Two' },{  $rename: {    likes: 'views'  }})Delete Rowdb.posts.remove({ title: 'Post Four' })Sub-Documentsdb.posts.update({ title: 'Post One' },{  $set: {    comments: [      {        body: 'Comment One',        user: 'Mary Williams',        date: Date()      },      {        body: 'Comment Two',        user: 'Harry White',        date: Date()      }    ]  }})Find By Element in Array ($elemMatch)db.posts.find({  comments: {     $elemMatch: {       user: 'Mary Williams'       }    }  })Add Indexdb.posts.createIndex({ title: 'text' })Text
